website_summaries.verdict: Sensitive skin will love these wet tissues.
pros: Does not leave a sticky feeling
Wipe is gentle but strong enough to clean other surfaces
Absorbent enough to clean up the big messes
Gentle enough to wipe even diaper rash bottoms
cons: A little stiffer than other brands

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have if you have someone that makes messes!
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes! Love the dispenser!! You can just throw these right into the diaper bag, and even months later the wipes are still moist and full of cleaning vigor. As an aside, these are not just great for baby's bottom, but also are great for general cleaning, for instance it removes crayon from marble, and television screens. They also work quite well for getting marker off the wall and little hands. They get puke off the car seat as a great short term solution, and permanent marker off of pumpkins. I can't think of much that a newborn through 5 year old (and their dad ;) ) can throw at you that these great wipes can't handle!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B. Cieszlak

customer_reviews.title: Gave My Baby A Rash
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about using these wipes on my 2mobth old because the ingredients are minimal and better than many wipe brands out there. Unfortunately though, these wipes gave my baby a rash- very red and bumpy. I had gone through one pack of the wipes before I realized that what was causing his rash. And within a day of not using these my baby's rash completely went away. These wipes are also very thick and slightly rough. I gave two stars instead of one because I like the company and the idea of these wipes. But I definitely expected better from Seventh Generation. I returned the rest of the packages I had.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and strong but not as safe.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, they are thick and don't seem to waste much. My only concern is the ingredients. Read the label and look up stuff before you buy. I am currently using Jackson Reece but they are similar to the babyganics material but way better for us. The ingredients for Jackson Reece aren't as bad but because they are #1expensive, especially when in Hawaii, we have to order and it takes almost two weeks to get here so our 2nd choice would be the babyganics. If Seventh generation had the ingredients of Jackson Reece or better we would definitely switch.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Earth's Best wipes, but unfold easier out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: We are 90% of the time a cloth-diapering, cloth-wipes family, but sometimes for the middle of the night away, from the baby's main changing table, we wanted another option. We've tried both these and Earth's Best and found that these unfold better out of the pop-up mechanism, although they are a little smaller in size. We like the little plastic opener--it's easier to seal with one hand than the kind that have have the peel-back opening. The wipes are gentle and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands of wipes, natural and not. These are by far my favorite. They have just the right amount of moisture, not too wet or dry, and are nice and thick. That means I don't have to use as many wipes to clean my baby. And the fact that they are natural is a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Thick, effective, non-toxic wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are thick, don't smell weird, and are all natural/non-toxic. I was using Babyganics before, but found the wipes to be too silky; it was difficult to get my baby's dirty butt cleaned without using 5 wipes. With Seventh Gen, i use 1-2 wipes for a "big job". I also like Honest Co. wipes, but Seventh Gen is a bit cheaper and definitely comprable in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Folsom

customer_reviews.title: I had always used Huggies sensitive skin wipes until I started having terrible irritation on my rear end
customer_reviews.text: In our house these are baby wipes AND grown up wipes. I had always used Huggies sensitive skin wipes until I started having terrible irritation on my rear end. I thought I had hemorrhoids it was so bad. NOPE. Just the nasty chemicals in those wipes. Switched to 7th Gen and no more irritation. Just a lot of guilt for having used those nasty wipes when my first son was a baby. Sorry dude.
customer_reviews.author: katiekat

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to see that 7th Generation finally came out with ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to see that 7th Generation finally came out with a wipes container with an easier closure on it. It was always so inconvenient with the old closures and it caused a lot of drying up of the wipes, even though I simply loved the product. This new closure is ideal and ensures that I'll be a steady customer for these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Floretta O'brien

customer_reviews.title: Great but leaks sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Tried several different wipes: honest. Earths. Costco etc. These had great fabric and amount of moisture but i only get frustrated when my diaper bag gets wet..the lids seem to either work or not work..when they dont everything i have in my bag gets wet which us frustrating
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Just wish they had this design when my kids were babies....
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Seventh Generation wipes for 8 years since our first child was born. I have been through several iterations of these wipes at this point and these are my absolute favorite. They are strong and the new packs are far superior to their previous versions. I keep wipes in my car to this day as they are infinitely useful for cleaning up messes made by kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Sam mostly

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday wipes
customer_reviews.text: Use these thick, sturdy wipes everyday and never had a problem with them nor is my baby's skin irritated by the wipes. Very natural, which is awesome, too (I found so many brand name wipes on the market than contain parabens and other chemicals that I wouldn't even want in my cosmetics, let alone my baby's skincare products!). Only 4 out of 5 stars because I wish the wipes were a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: LPK

customer_reviews.title: Flip top is essential
customer_reviews.text: I tried another 7th generation version of wipes without the flip top and it was a total pain. I switched to these from the Costco brand once my little guy started eating lots of real food and his bum started to become more sensitive. I like how thick these are without being unwieldy. These are super mild and never irritate him.
customer_reviews.author: JackieG

customer_reviews.title: They are Strong
customer_reviews.text: Upside: These are thickest wipes I've ever encounter. They are not as soft as some of the other ones, but these are strong and high quality wipes for the price. Downside, they are so thick they sometimes don't fit into the little crevices that baby has. All that being said, I still prefer these over other wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and gentle for the little one.
customer_reviews.text: We buy these wipes in bulk and love them. Absolutely no need to have scented wipes to clean your baby up, if they smell that bad then they simply need a bath! Would recommend these wipes to any parents who want a simple, unscented wipe for their loved little one.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: I used Earth's Best wipes. These are so much better - they ...
customer_reviews.text: before these, I used Earth's Best wipes. These are so much better - they don't stick together when you pull them out, the package seals shut fairly effectively, they have a nice thickness to them without overdoing it, and I like the size of each wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these wipes on subscribe and save for over a year now. These wipes are good quality wipes with the right amount of moisture. My only complaint is that the wipes stick when pulling it out, therefore grabbing multiple wipes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: We don't use any other wipes
customer_reviews.text: We buy these by the case! Other wipes, even those labeled for sensitive skin, still made our little one break out in red bumps. There is a scent to them, but no added smells. The wipes are very moist, which is great for messy jobs!! The flip top lid always closes easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christina & Eric

customer_reviews.title: I feel fresh, know what I'm saying???
customer_reviews.text: More for men than babies, they are large, strong, durable, and get "the job" done. Buy in bulk, best butt wipes I've used, esp. bang for the buck...cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: tyler durden

customer_reviews.title: These work nice but they are excessively wet
customer_reviews.text: These work nice but they are excessively wet... felt like i had to wait a while for my baby's bottom to dry after using these
customer_reviews.author: laurabee99

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. The best I've ever used on my baby. They are thick and soft at the same time. Plus being eco friendly at a decent price is very awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: ... all the baby wipe brands (and off brands) and love these the most
customer_reviews.text: We tried all the baby wipe brands (and off brands) and love these the most. Good deal in bulk. They come out of the package easily, don't leave a sticky residue, and our sturdy. No strong scent either. Such a great company! The flip top is a must -- otherwise the seal tears and the wipes dry up.
customer_reviews.author: onpaperwings

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. The third time we've ordered them. They don't fall apart at all and they have not irritated his bunghole at all. I like that they do not contain a lot of ingredients but do a great job cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kristene Worges

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes, less chemicals than other brands and they don't tear! That's a major bonus for me considering I have triplets. They're not too thin but not too thick either, I prefer them over any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: karista earnest

customer_reviews.title: a simple clean
customer_reviews.text: I love that i can close the lid so the wipes dont dry out. But the best part is the fact that these clean without leaving any residue or scent. It just cleans.
customer_reviews.author: handj

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They do not stick together as much ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They do not stick together as much as the Earth's Best wipes, don't have the chemical smell of other wipes, and don't irritate my sensitive guy's bum. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: A whole box of defective wipes
customer_reviews.text: The wipes have a new packaging, which I ordered but I received the older version of the wipes. Disappointed. Also, I've tried 3 packs in this bundle and each of them have been defective - every other wipe I pull out isn't cut it's an 18 inch long wipe that I have to tear apart. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great, they are my "go to" gift for every ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they are my "go to" gift for every baby shower, I always order a case. The wipes are very strong and the improved package with the flip top is great.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie V

customer_reviews.title: Best Eco-friendly & safe wipes around-- super thick for nasty ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Eco-friendly & safe wipes around-- super thick for nasty blow outs while still soft enough not to rash my overly sensitive LO's booty!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Large with great texture!
customer_reviews.text: Size and texture make clean up way easier than other wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Kslrsa

customer_reviews.title: Like the wipes...
customer_reviews.text: I have used these wipes for over a year now but, these were opened and dry when I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Best brand of the "green" type of wipes
customer_reviews.text: Best brand of the "green" type of wipes. No harsh chemicals and never gives skin issues to our kids who both have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: blairf

customer_reviews.title: These are very strong and thick. We use them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong and thick. We use them for cleaning our hands all the time when we are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Falwene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Here are awesome wipes I get lots of compliments from her school about the quality!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using other wipes bc I learned about the harmful ingedients in other baby wipes. I want to use the healthiest option and this is what I decidec on. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: This multi-pack is a great deal, and the clickable plastic lid makes all ...
customer_reviews.text: This multi-pack is a great deal, and the clickable plastic lid makes all the difference in the world for both ease of use and keeping the wipes moist.
customer_reviews.author: brooker73

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: We use these daily and baby likes them as much as we do! I love taking an almost empty container and tossing it in the diaper bag. The lid is ideal for one-handed diaper changes!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: These are the best baby wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baby wipes. Huggies natural wipes are totally crappy compared to this. Best brand of natural wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ramos

customer_reviews.title: snap lid sucks
customer_reviews.text: the snap lid suck. they never stay shut, must store them upside down. otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stegospine

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on the baby and your hands.
customer_reviews.text: These get the job done better than the name brand whipes.
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez from ca

customer_reviews.title: clean, thick, and capable of tackling biggest messes
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes hands down. These don't leave sticky residue and are also great for removing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Like These Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and well moistened. Like the fact that there is no scent to them. Priced very well. Well worth getting them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes. Nice and thick and don't get dried ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes. Nice and thick and don't get dried out as easily as other brands I have tried. They also don't leave a nasty residue like others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: best wipes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever! Soft but thick, gentle enough to use on face or hands.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these!! I only use these wipes for his face and hands after a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Truelady

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes I've ever used  I will never. Buy any other brand !!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best and only wipes I will buy now they are the perfect wetness and thickness
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Livingston-Murillo

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy I tried these
customer_reviews.text: I like the thinner better but love this brand for diaper wipes
customer_reviews.author: Black Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are wonderful! We have twin boys and we use a lot of wipes! We have tried different brands of wipes and these are by far, the best. They are thick, moist and strong. What we like most is that these wipes don't have chemicals in them and they do not bother our babies bums.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product!! These wipes are thick, the right amount of moisture to really clean and almost never tear. My son had sensitive skin and these never irritated him, even as a newborn. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaMb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE WIPES
customer_reviews.text: Super thick and love that they are chemical and sent free. a must have for all parents and sensitive babies
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Defintiely get the flip lid
customer_reviews.text: Great product b/c they don't have an overpowering odor. I love the flip lid b/c that way you can keep the moisture in so that the wipes don't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Espanolita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. We love them
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We love them. My son has sensitive skin and ever since I switch to this wipes he never had a break out. I am convinced that these are free of all the chemical garbage... Definitely recommend.:)
customer_reviews.author: Dalton

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIPES
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best wipes ever for my baby. I've used every wipe ever created and these are THICK & STRONG & MOIST & SOFT.
customer_reviews.author: Physical Graffiti

customer_reviews.title: Buy These Now
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are thick and durable. We don't leave the house without them!
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My son has super sensitive skin, but we've never had a problem with any 7th Generation diapering product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Huston

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work well to clean yourself or a baby.
customer_reviews.author: redlin51

customer_reviews.title: Too thick for me. I'll go back to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Too thick for me. I'll go back to the thinner version.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Our new favorite wipes. These are so much better than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Our new favorite wipes. These are so much better than the Huggie brand we had been using which always pulled out several rather than one. These are great and easy to grab just one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The Best wipes, IMO
customer_reviews.text: I have used these wipes for both babies, for the last five years. They are the only ones that keep my kids from getting rashes. They've changed and granted, I like the way they USED to be better. They are thicker, but still - no rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes out there. Strong yet gentle. And safe for all kinds of uses.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan d. myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes!! The only ones that help us avoid diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes thick strong. Just wished they had a biodegradable option but much better wipes than Naty wipes.
customer_reviews.author: citygirlmomwife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite wipes. Durable and doesn't irritate skin.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Love these now that my baby has started solids
customer_reviews.text: Love these now that my baby has started solids. They are durable wipes that make cleaning him up so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thick and strong
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. They are thick and strong no need to use to many and each use. Last long time.,
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are very thick and dont contain harmful chemicals. They can even be washed in the washing machine and used for cleaning later. They are great on sensitive baby skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C. Asleson

customer_reviews.title: Quality thick and durable wipes
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! They are so nice and thick, and very moist. They are on the smaller side, but still plenty big enough to get the job done. And they don't smell gross!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Cogen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand the negative reviews. These wipes are awesome and by far our favorites. They are thick and soft, and we rarely need to use more than one. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Mescha Ploss

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, all natural and thick enough to clean extremely well using a minimal amount. Love them and definitely recommend to all families
customer_reviews.author: Jade Watt

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes for my daughter. My husband wishes they were thicker. I do not have a problem with the thickness. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Klappleb137

customer_reviews.title: What a wipe should be.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I’ll use. On me. Somehow Seventh Generation has figured out how to make a wipe without any chemicals, which is something nobody else has seemed to master. As such, I feel good using them anywhere and everywhere. I’ll leave it at that :-)
customer_reviews.author: trashycuz

customer_reviews.title: Really like the new wipes!!
customer_reviews.text: Some other reviewers say they don't like the new wipes, but I love these. The old ones were a bit softer but also felt like they left a residue. These feel cleaner and more durable. Most importantly, these are the ONLY brand of wipes that don't give my baby a rash. A couple of times, we've had to use other wipes because we ran out or were out of town and didn't have enough, and our baby got a diaper rash right away. As soon as we switched back to these, it cleared up. That's worth a downgrade in softness in my book any day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: moofy818

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love many kinds of Seventh Generation products. But disappointed this wipes since many many balled up fiber come off on skin. can't use it to baby. Wasted money for $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed design since 2012 - Less Effective
customer_reviews.text: Too bad. Have been using this product for 3 years and really liked it the way it was. These wipes have been changed significantly from my last purchase several months ago. I find them a lot less functional - I need to use more product / job than previously and they are much less soft than before. Switching to Pampers Natural Clean which is softer and more effective but make fewer environmentally friendly claims.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleTechMom

customer_reviews.title: The new Lid is a needed upgrade!!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great in my opinion and the new lid is way better than the older packaging with the little sticky tab that doesn't really stick. I have been using these since my daughter was a few months old, she is now 17 months old. I love that they are thick and do not irritate her sensitive skin. They are not that strong though, as they can easily rip while trying to remove them from the package. But overall the wipes are a great value and as long as they don't change I will continue to buy them for as long as I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Halimah S.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby wipes on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply the best baby wipes on the market. My daughter was getting diaper rash after diaper rash and nothing was working. As soon as we switched to Seveth Generation we had no more issues. They are very natural and also durable - you don't need a whole bunch to clean up a big mess. I would highly recommend these especially if your baby has sensitve skin
customer_reviews.author: Pug

customer_reviews.title: Effective wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes! I have tried several other brands of baby wipes including babyganics, Target brand, pampers sensitive, Honest Co and Kirkland. The texture, thickness and wetness of these are a great combination that allow me to not have to use so many wipes when my son has a BM. The other wipes that I have tried all seem to thin and I have ended up using more when cleaning up a dirty diaper. I also really like the flip top container. It is easier to keep the wipes moist this way instead of the packages that just have the tape on top.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lovegood

customer_reviews.title: Safe,
customer_reviews.text: Strength 5 stars Lack of smell 5 stars Non-toxicity 5 stars Versitility 5 stars (can be used for diaper changes, wiping hands, and wiping faces!!!!!!) The best wipes I have ever used! I wish I would have known about these for my first two kids. I will never use a different wipe again. Most wipes can only be used on the bottom (which seems weird). These can be used on the face and the bottom. I keep a pack everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Robbi J Heath

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: I do prefer the old version of these wipes, the ones I started using when our baby was born. These "new and improved" ones are very wet and by the end of the pack they can get messy. I rated these a 5 star because I have tried to switch many times, more lately because we recently moved to Italy and they've been hard to find. Our daughter (10 months) has very sensitive skin and even the advertised "natural" brands break her out in rashes. I've come to the conclusion these work for her and I will continue to order them. Plus, I love Seventh Generation!
customer_reviews.author: HaMerrill

customer_reviews.title: Too Thick and Dry for Our Tastes
customer_reviews.text: We love a lot of the Seventh Generation products for our child (and for our home!), but this is the one product that we did not enjoy and did not re-order. The wipes are too thick and too dry. The entire pack dries out really really quickly, which does not make diaper changing time a very happy time for our daughter. I'd look elsewhere unless you like a more dry and thick experience.
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: The quilted pattern is great for cleaning up those messy diapers
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for 8 months now and I will never use anything else! The quilted pattern is great for cleaning up those messy diapers. And it's so thick that I only have to use one or two at most each diaper change.
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect thicker diaoer wipes
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these wipes since birth. They are gentle and safe. Have never had problems with these causing any skin irritation or rashes. These are nice thick wipes which are great for big messes and they are generously sized as well. By far our favorite wipe and they seem be gentler and have less chemicals than other leading brands.
customer_reviews.author: MJJ

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes ever
customer_reviews.text: We've used pampers and this and what we have found is that this is thicker and drier than pampers and thus doesn't feel as cold to baby when she is being wiped but does a great job cleaning her bottoms and preventing her from getting a diaper rash. Don't know how many ply this is but it feels great for us too to wipe her because it's so thick and doesn't feel like it's going to tear midwipe.
customer_reviews.author: TheManHW

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. I'm so glad Amazon has them. I had the old Seventh Generation "orange" striped wipes but they stick together more and I think these ones clean better with fewer. They remind me of the Huggies wipes with less chemicals. I like the packaging for home and on the road. I keep one in the car, in my purse (once it's half full, it fits better) and on the changing station. I have had a hard time finding these and am so glad I can just get them shipped on Amazon now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Harlan

customer_reviews.title: ... and over because I truly believe they are the best option for my child
customer_reviews.text: I return to these baby wipes over and over because I truly believe they are the best option for my child. I extensively research every product that comes in contact with my kids, and this is no different. Not only are they natural, I appreciate the thick, non-slippery texture. You definitely only need one wipe at a time - they are that thick.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: baby tested, mom approved!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are really thick and durable. They definitely can stand up to a lot of poop! But they are extra great because they work well on sensitive skin. My baby girl has never broken out in a rash from these wipes. They are so great that I have signed up for Amazon Subscribe and Save and receive a delivery of these wipes every month.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: Good wipes, but little dry
customer_reviews.text: We like these wipes. They are thick and little dry. But it did not give any rash, so I am happy. These also do not contain any type of alcohol. Other wipes like pampers sensitive and huggies natural claim no alcohol, but they mean ethanol only. Those wipes do contain other types of alcohol. So these wipes truly do not contain alcohol. Con- they are twice as expensive as other wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Simran

customer_reviews.title: Love the packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wipes for my sensitive skin boys! They are thick and strong so i don't have to use as many and the quilted pattern really helps scrub. This packaging is convenient like the tubs but small enough to easily fit in a diaper bag. I find that if i leaving a package of these wipes in my car they stay much more moist that the packages with out the flip top because you get a better seal each time you close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this wipe
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wipe, mainly b/c it does its job and also because of the company's concern for ingredients and concern for the environment... Only downfall is when they're a little dry or you clean pretty dirty kid hands, they can "shed" a little.
customer_reviews.author: jamie gualtieri

customer_reviews.title: Too rough, caused rash.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on the good reviews when comparing most common brands of wipes for my newborn. My son was just a couple days old and he got a diaper rash while using these - changed diapers and eventually these wipes. Opened another package to try again now that he's 2 months and the rash returned immediately. Will never buy again. They are too stiff for me and probably too rough on his skin hence the rash. Will be sticking with Kirkland. Sorry Earth.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: if I use another brand that's thinner I feel like I have to use a million of them
customer_reviews.text: After using these, if I use another brand that's thinner I feel like I have to use a million of them! Love these wipes and feel like they do a nice job cleaning without repeated wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Just ok. Not for new born skin.
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. We bought them in preparation for our new born and they made his little butt red and irritated. We switched to wash clothes. Now that he is older he can handle them, but we also bought one pack of water wipes to try and those worked so much better. His skin doesn't break out with the water wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Wiitala

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes for poop
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these wipes. I can't say that enough. They are the best for cleaning up poop. They are thick and have these grooves that just grab the poop right off the baby's butt for an easy cleanup
customer_reviews.author: Jill Valero

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had better ingredients
customer_reviews.text: But it works so well, our daughter hasn't had any negative reaction to it and they are the perfect thickness and dampness....prefer over Earth's best because earth's best is thinner and soapier... I just really wish they had better ingredients but since her skin isn't reacting to them and like I said the texture and wetness level is great so we keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: TheatreandFilm

customer_reviews.title: Love these wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! The ingredients are pretty easy on the skin and through Amazon they are about $0.03 a wipe. They are nice and thick and clean. The Costco wipes are $0.02 a wipe, but much thinner and not as clean. Totally worth the $0.01 price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are amazing. All other "sensitive" variations I have tried with ...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are amazing. All other "sensitive" variations I have tried with other brands are either too thin of a wipe or actually sting my behiney. If they sting me, I know they are stinging to my children. These wipes are both comfortable and very thick. A win/win situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Really love these and the snap lid helps keep only one ...
customer_reviews.text: Really love these and the snap lid helps keep only one (most times) coming out at a time. Haven't had any issues w/them ripping. Size is just right and they truly are unscented. Also, package is a good size for home or diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Buzzsaw

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes out there.
customer_reviews.text: The whole family uses these. Less chemicals means less irritation. God only knows what's in most commercial wipes that will come back to haunt our kids (or us) some day. We are hoping that these wipes aren't harmful. I wish I had used them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: cosmopolitancowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes, thick and soft
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. I've used it on my grandbaby and it doesn't seem to irritate her little bottom. She is a premature newborn and very sensitive. They fit well in the warmer which makes it even more gentle and comforting for her. I like them and will reorder them.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the best wipes I've used but they get the job done. Typically requires at least 3 wipes to totally clean a poopy butt. The wipes are on the thin side and are sometimes a pain to get out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Thick, soft, doesn't tear when you're wiping your ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick, soft, doesn't tear when you're wiping your baby's bum. Also doesn't tear when you have to clean your baby's back because he's had a blowout.
customer_reviews.author: Top Chef

product_meta.title: Seventh Generation Thick & Strong Free and Clear Baby Wipes with Flip Top Dispenser, 768 Count
product_meta.description:
Sensitive little bottoms demand extra talc at changing time. New and improved free and clear baby wipes combine gentle, cloth like performance with the thickness you need to wipe away little and big messes. As always, our baby wipes are free of alcohol, dyes, synthetic fragrances, parabens and phthalates. Keep a spare pack handy for clean up on the go. You'll love the way the generously sized wipes handle meal time spills, grubby hands, muddy feet and everything in between.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Seventh Generation is one of the nation's leading natural brands of household and personal care products. The company lives its commitment to "caring today for seven generations of tomorrows," with products formulated to provide mindful solutions for human health, air, surfaces, fabrics, pets and people within your home—and for the community and environment outside of it.

CARING TODAY FOR SEVEN GENERATIONS OF TOMORROWS
Unscented baby wipes by Seventh Generation are thick, strong and ready to get to work. Designed to be Kind to your baby, these generously-sized wipes are built with the cleaning power you need and the care your baby deserves. You’ll get all the comfort and performance of cloth while using fewer wipes. Try using just one less wipe per change and watch the savings grow. Serious cleaning is needed for more than just sensitive bottoms. Seventh Generation baby wipes are all-in-one mess masters, quickly swiping up spills and gently unsticking little hands. Count on them for beach days, spaghetti nights and everything in-between. 

FREE AND CLEAR: WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?
When it comes to our baby wipes, Free and Clear means more than just unscented and dye-free. Our wipes are also free of alcohol, synthetic fragrances, parabens and phthalates. They’re non-toxic, non-sensitizing, hypoallergenic and safe for use on sensitive skin.Your baby doesn’t get to choose what goes on her sensitive skin, but you do. Now, you can feel good about choosing Free and Clear love.

BABY WIPES ON A MISSION
Our strongest baby wipes yet are also naturally designed to support our mission. Seventh Generation is committed to the health and happiness of your baby and our planet, so our Free and Clear Baby Wipes get their strength from wood pulp, a renewable resource. Seventh Generation lives this commitment by searching for and delivering more sustainable solutions and never testing products on animals. Now you can have a clean baby and a clean conscience—all in one. 


OUR BABY WIPES
 * Hypoallergenic
 * Made with renewable resources
 * Free of parbens and pthalates
 * Free of alcohol, dyes & synthetic fragrances

SEVENTH GENERATION PRODUCTS YOU'LL LOVE

Seventh Generation Free & Clear Diapers

Seventh Generation Overnight Diapers

Seventh Generation Training Pants
feature_bullets: Pack of 12, 768 total baby wipes with convenient flip-top snap-tight opening on each package
Seventh Generation Baby Wipes are safe for Baby, hands and face
Fragrance free and 0% alcohol, parabens and phenoxyethanol
Strong and thick baby wipes make it easier to clean up all of Baby’s messes
